content:
In the StructureDefinition Editor, I've created a constrained resource (profile based on a core FHIR resource). In the "RAW" tab, the "differential" element exists with the correct contents. But to be useful, I need the "snapshot" element. I would have expected the "RAW" JSON/XML would have included the base FHIR resource elements along with the changed/constrained elements.

How do I go about getting a fully defined JSON/XML representation that I can downoad?
Are there any plans to include support in the CapabilityStatement editor for these elements: "Software", "Implementation", "Instantiates", "Profiles", and "ImplementationGuides"?
@Joe Paquette When you run "Publish" it will run the IG Publisher and create all the snapshots (as well as all other generated content) that you can then download.
